sentences.en: He used the medium of radio when he wanted to enlist public support or reassure the citizenry.
sentences.cn: 当他想得到公众支持或恢复民信时，他使用广播作载体。

sentences.en: Attention should now move to the citizenry.
sentences.cn: 接下来应该将注意力转移到公民身上了。

sentences.en: A Call For An 'Alert And Knowledgeable Citizenry'
sentences.cn: 一个对“警觉和有知识的公民”的呼唤
